sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router" import moviesServices from '../../services/movies.services' import { Button, Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import './TopMovieDetailsPage.css' const { formatDate } = require('../../utils/formatDate'); import { AuthContext } from "../../context/auth.context" const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const MovieDetailsPage = () => { const { movie_id } = useParams() const baseImageUrl = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original' const [movie, setMovie] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { oneMovieFetch() }, []) const oneMovieFetch = () => { moviesServices .getOneMovie(movie_id) .then(({ data }) => setMovie(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const addToWatchlist = () => { ProfileService .AddWatchlistId(movie_id, user._id) } return (
< img className="img image" src={`${baseImageUrl}${movie.poster_path}`} alt="movie-poster" />

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

Fecha de estreno: {formatDate(movie.release_date)}

Puntuaci√≥n media: {movie.vote_average}
) } export default MovieDetailsPage
